description.zh: Hiccup 是一个快速的静态起始页，帮助用户快速访问最重要的链接。它可以作为家庭服务器页面、通过浏览器扩展作为新标签页使用，或部署在任何支持静态网页的地方。项目强调速度、自定义和离线可用性。
description.en: Hiccup is a fast, static start page designed to help users quickly access their most important links. It can be used as a home server page, new browser tab interface via extensions, or hosted anywhere static webpages are supported. The project emphasizes speed, customization, and offline usability.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 轻量级且加载速度快的静态网页
- 完全可定制且隐私友好的用户体验
- 支持离线使用及多配置管理

## 功能列表:

- 静态网页
- 精选链接
- 分类功能
- 拖拽添加链接和图片
- 支持多种搜索引擎及自定义搜索引擎的搜索功能
- 支持链接和标签搜索
- Docker 支持
- 多配置文件支持
- 加载远程配置
- 多种缓存策略（cache、network、cache-first、network-first）
- 支持 PWA
- 键盘快捷键
- 完整的键盘导航支持
- 只读模式
- 通过 JSON 配置
- 支持拖拽上传配置文件
- 快捷键快速导航
- 编辑模式管理精选卡片和分类
- 内置配置管理器用于加载、预览和同步配置
- 支持通过 URL 共享配置
- 自动迁移旧版本配置
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Lightweight and fast loading static webpage
- Fully customizable and private user experience
- Supports offline usage and multiple configurations

## Features:

- Static Webpage
- Featured Links
- Categories
- Drag to add links and images
- Search with support for various search providers and custom ones
- Links and tag support in search
- Docker support
- Multiple profiles
- Load remote profile
- Caching strategies (cache, network, cache-first, network-first)
- PWA support
- Keyboard shortcuts
- Full keyboard navigation support
- Read Only mode
- Configurable via JSON
- Drag & drop configuration file support
- Hotkeys for quick navigation
- Edit mode for managing featured cards and categories
- Built-in config manager for loading, previewing, and syncing configurations
- Support for sharing configurations via URL
- Automatic migration for older config versions
